articles.author: Sujith Somraaj
articles.description: Launched first as an algorithmic stablecoin, Tron's USDD has changed its operating model to avoid possible collapse like Terra’s UST.
articles.title: Justin Sun’s Terra-like Stablecoin Now Boasts Backing in Bitcoin, Tether, Tron

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Gala Games plants a Web3 flag in the popular PC marketplace Epic Games Store with plans to roll out its battle royale game this year.
articles.title: Epic Games Store’s First NFT Game Is Gala’s Wild West Shooter GRIT

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Total cryptocurrency scam losses by Australians in the first four months of this year alone amounted to $81.5 million, according to the country’s consumer watchdog.
articles.title: Aussie Investors Have Already Lost Over $80M to Crypto Scams This Year

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Bitcoin and Ethereum, the top two cryptocurrencies by market capitalization, saw a 5% spike in price in the last 24 hours.
articles.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Jump 5% as Crypto Market Rebounds

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The popular Web3 app suggested its users "take some rest" while engineers worked on the issue.
articles.title: 'Move-to-Earn' Game Stepn Hit With DDOS Attacks—Again

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Others have criticized criticism of the platform, saying it shouldn’t be blamed if not used correctly.
articles.title: Bored Apes Co-Founder Criticizes Discord After NFTs Worth 200 Ethereum Snatched in Exploit

articles.author: Sujith Somraaj
articles.description: The median individual loss reported was about $2,600, but that figure for victims in their 70s was nearly $12,000.
articles.title: Roughly 70% of $1 Billion Lost to Crypto Scammers Since 2021 Was Bitcoin: FTC

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Elsewhere, Vitalik Buterin ponders an anti-crypto letter sent to U.S. lawmakers, and New York's governor considers a two-year mining ban.
articles.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: Elon Musk and Dogecoin Co-Creator Jackson Palmer Exchange Words

articles.author: Shuyao Kong
articles.description: Tech giants have become tech dwarves in China in the wake of COVID and a government crackdown on cutting-edge tech.
articles.title: What It Means to Be Chinese in Crypto

articles.author: Sujith Somraaj
articles.description: A lot of very talented people are very upset. And some now face harsh deadlines to gets jobs or lose their immigration status.
articles.title: Jilted Would-Be Coinbase Employees Vent Online After Jobs They Accepted Are Eliminated

articles.author: Daniel Roberts
articles.description: Big crypto companies like Coinbase, Gemini, Bitso and more are battening down the hatches. Will they emerge from it leaner and stronger?
articles.title: Crypto Winter Layoffs Hit Hard—But Won’t Kill the Industry

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Also: The Bank of England announced plans for stablecoin “oversight,” and The Weeknd is teaming up with Binance.
articles.title: This Week in Coins: Markets Flatten, Kanye Files Web3 Trademarks, Eurovision Winners Donate Ethereum to Ukraine

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Recipients of Optimism’s token quickly dumped it, sending the price down 82% and angering many community members.
articles.title: What ‘Responsibility’ Do Token Airdrop Recipients Have?

articles.author: Sujith Somraaj
articles.description: An ApeCoin proposal is polling the community on whether they want to stay within Ethereum. So far, it’s been a resounding “yes.”
articles.title: ApeCoin Community Looks Set to Stay on Ethereum—For Now

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Dr. Bombay’s Sweet Exploration will use the rapper’s Bored Ape Yacht Club avatar to anchor a Los Angeles eatery.
articles.title: Snoop Dogg to Open Bored Ape NFT-Themed Dessert Restaurant

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: Latin American cryptocurrency companies batten down the hatches, joining their U.S. peers in response to seismic shifts in the market.
articles.title: LatAm Bitcoin Exchanges Announce Major Layoffs to Prepare for Crypto Winter

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Seeing logos for crypto companies everywhere in pro basketball this season? There are at least 130 million reasons for that.
articles.title: NBA Crypto Sponsorship Spending Increased 7,300% This Season: Report

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: The New York State Senate has approved a bill that would create a 2-year moratorium on Bitcoin mining. Gov. Hochul has 10 days to sign or veto it.
articles.title: Kathy Hochul Will Decide Fate of Bitcoin Mining in New York

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The 3-on-3 basketball league is adding more features to its team ownership NFTs following issues with May’s original mint.
articles.title: Ice Cube: BIG3 Re-Launching Its Ethereum NFT Team Stakes to Make Them ‘Juicy Enough’

articles.description: Shiti Manghani of STEPN, Ty Blackard of NFTY Labs, William Quigley of Wax blockchain, and Spencer Yang of Gomu talk with Decrypt's Dan Roberts about how the next era of NFTs will have utility and real-world use cases, as part of CoinMarketCap's The Capital virtual conference.
articles.title: NFTs with Utility: STEPN, NFTY Labs, Wax, and Gomu Predict What's Next

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Japan’s Parliament has passed a new law that would create a regulatory framework for stablecoins, essentially defining them as digital money.
articles.title: Japan Passes Stablecoin Bill Aimed at Protecting Crypto Investors

articles.author: Sujith Somraaj
articles.description: Gemini has been charged by the CFTC with misleading the regulator during the exchange’s Bitcoin futures approval process.
articles.title: CFTC Charges Gemini for Providing 'Material False' Statements on Bitcoin Futures Product

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The New York State Senate passed a bill that would impose a two-year moratorium on any new fossil-fueled crypto mining operations.
articles.title: New York Senate Passes Two-Year Bitcoin Mining Moratorium

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The crypto crash and fears of a Crypto Winter have prompted Coinbase to get even more aggressive in cutting costs.
articles.title: Coinbase Freezes Hiring and Will Rescind Accepted Job Offers

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The NFT collection on OpenSea features images of several figures that Depp calls “friends and heroes.”
articles.title: Johnny Depp Ethereum NFTs Surge After Actor Wins Defamation Suit Against Amber Heard

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: It’s normal that “various classes of normies and often soon grifters move in over time” as movements like crypto grow, Vitalik said.
articles.title: Ethereum Founder Vitalik Buterin Muses On Crypto-Skeptic Letter to Washington

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The Weeknd will launch various NFT collections as Binance comes aboard the After Hours ‘Til Dawn concert tour.
articles.title: Binance and The Weeknd Launch a ‘Crypto-Powered’ World Tour

articles.author: Sujith Somraaj
articles.description: ForUsAll is suing the Department of Labor after the regulator discouraged retirement planners from turning to crypto.
articles.title: Crypto 401(k) Provider ForUsAll Sues US Department of Labor

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Crypto exchange Coinbase processed a record-high number of transactions in May, however, it still fell behind FTX in terms of trading volume.
articles.title: FTX Overtook Coinbase in Bitcoin Volume for First Time Ever in May: Report

articles.description: Dan Held, a longtime Bitcoin influencer and now head of growth marketing at crypto exchange Kraken, talks to Decrypt's Dan Roberts about Bitcoin maximalists (he calls himself a "mostamalist"), NFTs, and Crypto Winter as part of CoinMarketCap's The Capital virtual conference.
articles.title: Kraken's Dan Held Talks Bitcoin Maximalism and Crypto Winter

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: "The crypto revolution is well underway and its impact will continue to be profound," the brothers wrote on Gemini's blog. "But its trajectory has been anything but gradual or predictable."
articles.title: Gemini Lays Off 10% of Staff to Prepare for Crypto Winter

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: Bitstamp has launched its Earn product to U.S. customers, allowing customers to earn interest on staking Ethereum and Algorand.
articles.title: Crypto Exchange Bitstamp Launches Earn Product for Ethereum, Algorand in US

articles.author: Jeff John Roberts
articles.description: Solana developers can now use Alchemy, the popular "pick and shovel" service that supplies tools to accelerate Web3 building.
articles.title: Blockchain Toolkit Alchemy Launches Solana Developer Platform

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The prices of Bitcoin and Ethereum, the world’s two biggest cryptocurrencies, dropped by about 5% each in the past 24 hours.
articles.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Fall 5% as Markets Slump Into Correction Territory

articles.description: Solana was briefly halted for more than four hours yesterday, triggering a massive sell-off of the network's native SOL cryptocurrency.
articles.title: Solana Plummets Double-Digits Amid Another Network Halt

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The fund, backed by DST Global and Breyer Capital, will be invested in Web3 projects.
articles.title: Binance Labs Announces $500 Million Web3 Fund

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: After railing against pitches for NFTs, the rapper and entertainer appears to be heading into the Web3 space.
articles.title: Kanye West Stakes Claim for NFT and Metaverse Trademarks

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: SOL is down 11% for the day as Solana dealt with another period of downtime, forcing a rollback and restart by validators.
articles.title: Bug Brings Down Solana Blockchain for Four Hours

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Both were sentenced to five years in prison for money laundering and conspiracy to manufacture and distribute marijuana.
articles.title: Father-Son Duo Sentenced for Laundering Cash with Bitcoin in Weed Scheme

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: Nate Chastain “betrayed OpenSea by using its confidential business information,” alleges U.S. Attorney Damian Williams.
articles.title: DOJ Charges Former OpenSea Exec in ‘Insider Trading Scheme’

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: The collection boasts: “No roadmap. No Discord. No utility.”
articles.title: These Urine-Loving Goblintown Ethereum NFTs Now Cost $16K

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: His jaw-dropping shots are in hot demand. Now he shares what’s next and why he’s “disappointed” with the photo NFT space lately.
articles.title: ‘Where My Vans Go’ Creator Drift on Next Moves, State of NFT Photography

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin speaks with Hollywood producer Bryan Unkeless and team members Bryce Anderson and Blaise Hemingway about their Web3 sci-fi project Runner, starting with an NFT project and a comic book all about racing.
articles.title: What Is Runner? 'Hunger Games' Co-Producer's Web3 Sci-Fi Project

articles.description: Decrypt’s Kate Irwin talks to veteran Hollywood film producer Niels Juul about why he’s going all in on NFTs and Web3.
articles.title: ‘The Irishman’ Exec Producer Niels Juul Gets Into NFTs

articles.description: Decrypt's Stephen Graves heads to the 2022 Cannes Film Festival, where he sits down with Leo Matchett of Decentralized Pictures, the Roman Coppola-backed nonprofit using crypto and blockchain voting to find, fund, and produce films.
articles.title: Decrypt at Cannes: Decentralized Pictures CEO Leo Matchett Talks Hollywood Embracing Crypto

articles.description: Decrypt's Stephen Graves is on the scene at the 2022 Cannes Film Festival, where he spoke to Miguel Faus, director of the film "Calladita," who funded his movie by selling NFTs to backers including NounsDAO.
articles.title: Decrypt at Cannes: 'Calladita' Director Miguel Faus on Funding Films with NFTs

articles.description: Crypto and sports continue to converge, and one of the best examples is DraftKings. CEO Jason Robins joins Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts to talk about how DraftKings is embracing NFTs as prizes, when the company might accept crypto for entry fees and bets, and how his experience dealing with regulators and lawmakers mirrors what crypto companies are now going through in Washington.
articles.title: gm Podcast, Episode 10: DraftKings Goes Crypto

articles.description: Web3 is the next evolution of the Internet, built on blockchains. Blockchains are a new kind of database, making new types of peer-to-peer apps possible. This has profound implications for humanity.
articles.title: Decrypt Learn: What is Web3?

articles.description: In Episode 10 of the Navigating the Metaverse podcast, hosted by Cathy Hackl and Tommaso di Bartolo, Andrew Hayward of Decrypt and Josh Roth of Decrypt Studios discuss how companies are approaching the metaverse, where it could all go next, and what it was like to watch a movie in a Lamborghini on the moon.
articles.title: How Brands Are Creating Immersive Experiences in the Metaverse

articles.description: Crypto bloodbath! How low will the major coins go, and what about Terra and stablecoins? Decrypt’s Dan Roberts, Jeff Benson, Stacy Elliott and Jason Nelson will discuss the news and parse through what’s happened and what might happen next.
articles.title: #DecryptLIVE: Crypto crash roundtable

articles.description: Infura co-founder and general manager E.G. Galano talks to Decrypt's Kate Irwin about what Infura does, how the Bored Ape Yacht Club could have avoided the hiccups with its Otherdeed NFT mint, other hot NFT collections like Moonbirds, and Ethereum's gas fee issues.
articles.title: Infura Co-Founder E.G. Galano Talks Otherside NFT Mint, Ethereum Gas Fees

articles.description: The long-planned upgrade to Ethereum aims to improve the network’s scalability and security by switching to a proof of stake consensus mechanism.
articles.title: Decrypt Learn: What Is Ethereum 2.0? Ethereum's Consensus Layer and Merge Explained
